My experience with ALBINA DYLA has been deeply disappointing
I ordered a gown for a special event,
they sent me two gowns that either had incorrect measurements or were missing the inner lining, making them faulty compared to what was advertised on their website
My event came and went, forcing me to scramble for a last-minute outfit due to their poor communication and lack of updates about whether a replacement would be sent
Now, I’m left with a defective gown that no one can wear or sell, having spent $1,500
The company refuses to issue a refund or even respond to my inquiries
This has been the worst experience I've had with any company
Please exercise caution with ALBINA DYLA
My experience was a little troubled
But in the end everything turned out well
Initially they informed me that during the process of making my wedding dress I would receive videos,
two months after the purchase I had never been sent a video until I asked for it
During this period I was only asked a few times to complete the payment of the dress that had already been paid in full at the time of the first contact
This unpleasant situation was repeated a few times even after always informing that the dress had already been paid
Then came the next problem, I started receiving videos and the dress looked nothing like the dress I bought, full of defects visible to the naked eye
I showed my discontent and were improving the dress during this week, at a certain point the dress no longer looked the same as in the first video
However, the following problem came every day I received a message asking if they could send the order even after I complained about the lack of quality
Several times during this time I asked to see the veil
it took a while until they sent me some image of it
Until I finally received one and

it was not exactly the same as the online store, it seemed reasonable and after questioning countless times if all the items on the order were in the package then I authorized the shipment of the order that was delivered in 3 days
Another surprise, during the whole process no one informed of the need to pay customs fees and duties,
there I paid
The dress is beautiful, fits perfectly and corresponds to what I bought, it still has small correctable defects
unacceptable in haute couture
However, I had a great disappointment with the veil that was nothing like the image sent by whatsapp or the image of the online store
It was full of defects and all chopped, it looked like a sin of cut and shapeless fabric
In addition, one of the accessories was also not sent
I complained and in 3 days later I received a new veil and the missing accessory, this time the veil is beautiful still nothing faithful to the image of the online store
acceptable, the head accessory is also different
I liked it and kept it
I had to pay customs fees again due to the store's mistake that said to assume these expenses and that's why I'm waiting for the money back
After all the troubled experience I am satisfied with the products
I think there is a lack of organization and quality control which can clearly bring problems to the brand and derogatory criticism

The dresses are authentic works of art that should not leave the atlier without a thorough control, these mistakes are acceptable at SHEIN or Zara not at Albina Dyla where we pay quality and exclusivity
But one thing I'm sure my dream dress couldn't be more real and Albina Dyla and her collaborators are responsible for it
Thank you

May 30th, I was contacted by an Albina Dyla sales Rep via Whatsapp
She contacted me regarding a dress place in my shopping cart on the "Albina Dyla" website
I informed the customer Rep of my upcoming birthday event; of which was 14 days away
I stressed the needed urgency
I was then instructed to send measurements for 4 locations which included "Bust, Waist, Hips, Biceps, and Sleeve length"
I also inquired about additional rhinestone placement on the garment
The Rep asked for placement, and I outlined desired placement via picture
The Rep confirmed, and said "You will receive a CONFIRMATION VIDEO before shipping"
The Rep created a listing which included a 20% discount with dress size 40EU
I told her "I am not a size 40EU"
She reassured me and said "It's okay because we will use your custom measurements"
After finalizing details with the Rep, I completed the transaction, and purchased the dress
May 31st, I message Albina Dyla via Whatapp for an update regarding my custom order
A Rep answered, stating "You did not provide full measurements"
She then provided a PDF file for precise measurements
I took the measurements, and shortly after, sent them
I also RESTATED the need for additional rhinestones AGAIN, because she was a new Representative
I was asked for visual aid for rhinestone placement AGAIN
I reconfirmed their placement AGAIN
After reconfirmation, the Rep immediately stopped responding
I did not receive another response until 3 hours later
The message after delayed response was "YOUR ITEM WILL BE shipped TODAY VIA DHL"
There was no confirmation of my custom measurements
There was no confirmation of additional rhinestones added to the garment
There was no confirmation video
After calling and messaging Albina Dyla incessantly, via Whatsapp, someone finally answered
She said "I am unsure if your garment has the custom measurements or additional rhinestones
You will have to wait for delivery via DHL on June 6th"
After providing this information, she ended the call
I followed up to find out if my dress was customized
No one answered calls nor texts
Today is June 1st
After multiple attempts of contact, a Rep finally responded
She stated "Your customizations were not completed"
I asked for further assistance, and once again the Rep ceased communication
My birthday is 12 days away, and I do not have a custom dress for my event
There was no apology, nor mediation
The mistake was obviously conducted on their end, and
none of the Reps attempted conflict resolution
I took a chance, and patronized with Albina Dyla because of their beautiful designs
And in return, the Albina Dyla company support team was dismissive of the problem and offered no help
In My experience, the Albina Dyla customer service team is unreachable and communication is inconsistent
Furthermore, their marketing offerings are been misrepresented
Today, I do not have a Birthday garment for my event; however, I do have strong distrust in The Albina Dyla company

Most definitely a scam
The dress that arrived did look like the photo, yes
However, and this is a big however, the quality pales in comparison to what it is priced
The dress I received doesn’t cost more than $20, and I purchased it for $500
The seams were falling apart both inside and outside of the dress, and the fabric was stretchy (expensive velvet does not stretch)
I asked them what the fabric was made out of and they said synthetic fibers, so I asked why the dress was $500 and they said “we are not informed on this”
They do an amazing job of fooling people; from the pristine website, the customer service agent emails you receive at first when ordering the dress
But after you receive it, all of a sudden you’re speaking with a nameless person in China via email and the return address is someone’s suburban home in NY
The shipping label for FedEx even has a different font than FedEx typically uses with grammatical errors, and the phone number they provide for contact is fake
I’m telling you, as elaborate and professional as the whole process looks and feels, it’s all fake and they did an excellent job fooling us
